transcript: I don't care what you do, see you can paint yourself green and dance naked in the plaspin dome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word as long as you love me best.

segments.text: I don't care what you do, see you can paint yourself green and dance naked in the plaspin dome
and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word as long as you love me best.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: I don't care what you do see. You can paint yourself green and dance naked in the Place Vendome, and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word, as long as you love me best.
